snippet: Hotels have always made an effort to get lost items back to customers, but their systems have usually been haphazard.
abstract: Joe Sharkey On the Road notes that hotels have always made effort to get lost items back to customers, but their systems have usually been haphazard; points out that Web site Chargerback provides method for hotels to manage and return found items to guests in orderly manner.
lead_paragraph: Hotels have always made an effort to get lost items back to customers, but their systems have usually been haphazard.

headline.print_headline: A Better Way to Reunite Lost Items With Owners
headline.seo: Chargerback Is a Web-Based Lost and Found for Hotels.
